author: intrepid42
body:
#### PR description:

* Updated interface for new major Rivet release 3.x
* Needs https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5107
* Add multiweight handling for PS (default) and ME/PDF (optional) variations.

#### PR validation:

* Processed Powheg ttbar with PS, ME, and PDF (NNPDF31_nnlo) uncertainties:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1311783/61883888-83a28000-aefb-11e9-8aed-4806c2dbfda1.png)

* Checked that output of `ParticleLevelProducer` remains as expected.
title: Update RivetInterface for Rivet 3.x
